body: @SoupOfDestiny hold onto that feeling. Use it to guide yourself through the horny

If you are reading this comment you are blessed. You and your family will live a good life. In the next five time you visit this website you will find a fantastic manga to fap to, and you will be protected against all the curses found in the comments. Please share this blessing and be kind to each others.
i like how they censored the word "dick" in page 10, really appreciate the effort to make the content child-friendly 👌
